lines:
TICO

1956 Lake

a 28 Wellen et 
crack 
t o Cambridyo Mam

August 14,191. 
My dear Mr. Stearno

i May believe that 
My letter of the 6th of August has 
already had the honor of being 
received. As I had informed Gace 
in that letter, it s luy ententisie 
to leave Cambridge for Princeton 
to attend our annual Conference 
ou the 15th of this Morith; e. 
tomorrow, But since my request 
for the trips expenees has not yet 
come, I have to post ponk the date 
of my trip until the arrival of your 
reply Spor will oblige menery 
Mülch if you can allow me my 
request, the sum of fifty dollara 165 
képace the 19th With thanks in 
Advance

Yours truly 
St. Luk
raw: TICO 1956 Lake a 28 Wellen et crack t o Cambridyo Mam August 14,191. My dear Mr. Stearno i May believe that My letter of the 6th of August has already had the honor of being received. As I had informed Gace in that letter, it s luy ententisie to leave Cambridge for Princeton to attend our annual Conference ou the 15th of this Morith; e. tomorrow, But since my request for the trips expenees has not yet come, I have to post ponk the date of my trip until the arrival of your reply Spor will oblige menery Mülch if you can allow me my request, the sum of fifty dollara 165 képace the 19th With thanks in Advance Yours truly St. Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that he will delay his departure for the Chinese Students' Conference until August 19th, since the $50 stipend has not been received.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
